meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Lennie Magida Michael Klaper Dale Schweinsberg Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #678.

td.p: Lennie Magida, a journalist from Baltimore, Maryland
Michael Klaper, a physician from Umatilla, Florida
Dale Schweinsberg, a U.S. Army officer from Rome, New York (whose 2-day cash winnings total $24,600)

tr.td: SPORTSCASTS
MEMPHIS
AUTHORS' MIDDLE NAMES
COLLEGES
DOGS
SHOW BIZ SHELLEYS
